field.name: Home Care for Diarrhoea with Some Dehydration | Take Action: After 4-Hour Period
Give mother/caregiver enough ORS packets to complete rehydration. Teach her how to mix and give ORS
If the child shows sign of improvement, advise mother to breastfeed frequently if child still breastfeeds
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
Counsel her on the 4 Rules of Home Treatment:
Give extra fluid: breast milk or clean water
Give zinc supplements (only for children aged 2 months – 5 years)
When to return to the health facility
Advise mother/caregiver to return after 5 days if condition does not improve
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
